item.title: IRC/Weechat
item.description: Weechat 安装 目前Weechat所有的script都能支持python2, 官方加以暂时都编译为python2。 $ cat /etc/portage/package.use/weechat net-irc/weechat python_single_target_python2_7 -python_single_target_python3_6 OTR (1) Install OTR [ebuild N ] dev-python/pycrypto-2.6.1-r2 USE="gmp -doc -test" PYTHON_TARGETS="python2_7 python3_6
